event.title: Free Software, Router Freedom and Digital Rights at Impropedia Show (online)

body.p: FSFE's Deputy Legal Coordinator, Lucas Lasota, will participate at the Impropedia show to talk about Free Software, Router Freedom and Digital Rights. The event will be hosted by KuZe Potsdam and will be broadcasted by the KuZe's channel in YouTube. The language is English.
The talk will start 20:00 CEST. No registration in required.
